Text: What is the smallest positive integer that uses only the @digits@ $0$ and $2$ in its @notation@ and is @divisible@ by $15$?

Draw a @hexagon@ with its @sides@ on a @square grid@ having @perimeter@ equal to its @area@! *Note:* The @area@ is the number of little @squares@ that make up the @hexagon@ and the @perimeter@ is the number of @sides@ of the little @squares@ on its @border@.
